alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Fulton; Izard (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued February 16 at 2:51AM CST until February 16 at 3:30AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northwestern Izard County in north central Arkansas... Western Fulton County in north central Arkansas... East central Baxter County in north central Arkansas... * Until 330 AM CST. * At 251 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Salesville, or 8 miles southeast of Mountain Home, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and hail up to two inches in diameter. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Oxford... Norfork... Salesville... Viola... Briarcliff... Bexar... Byron... Rodney... Norfork Dam... Diamond Bay... Flint Springs... Sturkie... Dolph... Union... Elizabeth... Mitchell... Jordan... Wild Cherry... Gepp... Wheeling... TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
